list.name: Some Browser Games
list.description: Just a few games I created while learning JavaScript. Everything is written in vanilla JS without any game engine. (Note: Only compatable with PC, not mobile friendly)

list.name: Student Login System
list.description: A Simple MEAN stack web app where Teachers can add, edit and delete marks sheets for students of its class and Students can also view their marks sheets.

list.name: A Portfolio + Blog for a friend
list.description: A custom designed static blogging website made with HUGO and integrated with Netlify CMS which makes adding new posts a breeze.

list.name: Tic Tac Toe Mobile Game
list.description: A simple tic tac toe mobile game made for both single player and double player with custom computer algorithm.

list.name: My Portfolio Website
list.description: Yes, I'm referring to the website you are currently on. It's a custom designed protfolio website made with GatsbyJS, a React based static site generator which makes this website blazing fast. Every content on this website comes from JSON files so editing or adding content is made as easy as possible.
